metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2048 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
ownCloud before 5.0.6 does not properly check permissions, which allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary API commands via unspecified vectors.  NOTE: this can be leveraged using CSRF to allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary API commands.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2048` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
